text: EVOL is Sonic Youth's third album. The title is 'love' spelled backwards. ==Tracklist== #"Tom Violence" 3:05 #"Shadow Of A Doubt" 3:32 #"Starpower" 4:51 #"In The Kindom #19" 3:24 #"Green Light" 3:46 #"Death to Our Friends" 3:16 #"Secret Girl" 2:55 #"Marilyn Moore" 4:05 #"Expressway To Yr. Skull" 7:20 Category:Sonic Youth albums Category:1986 albums
title: EVOL
